price: 32. Kaadu inni inah amqeeh tet amri oggola num yoo abe, kaadu kaxxamariinoley daalimtuh yaniy isi Rabbih amri cina yoo maabinna keenik iyye.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
